TextView.android:text:
Thank you for trying out Grade Calculator! This app is quite simple to use!
 
 GPA Calculation:
 
 Herec you can calculate your overall GPA based on a certain point scale.
 Your Grade is a Grade out of 1-100, and your GPA weight is the amount of credits your course is worth - for example, 0.5 or 1.0 credits.
 
 Final Grade Calculation:
 
 Here, you can calculate your final grade standing in a course.
 Your Grade is a Grade, again, a number from 1-100, and your Course Weight is the percentage amount of that mark towards your overall grade - for example, an assignment worth 30% of your grade. This is also a number from 1-100.
 
 As you add grades (the app currently supports calculation of up to 10 grades), you can scroll through to get access to all of the grades.
 
 I hope you enjoy this application, and more features are to come in the future!
